text: Newstral Article [israelnationalnews.com](/en/sources/222438) on 2024-09-26 22:45 Assessment in Israel: Iran increasing the arms smuggling to Hezbollah Related news [Report: Iran Smuggling Arms to Hezbollah on Civilian Flights](https://www.breitbart.com/jerusalem/2018/09/04/report-iran-smuggling-arms-to-hezbollah-on-civilian-flights/)[breitbart.com](/en/sources/222142),,,,[Hezbollah denies using Beirut port for arms smuggling](https://www.timesofisrael.com/hezbollah-denies-using-beirut-port-for-arms-smuggling/)[timesofisrael.com](/en/sources/198758),,,,[H](http://hamodia.com)[Report: Iran Smuggling Weapons Directly to Hezbollah by Air](https://hamodia.com/2018/11/29/report-iran-smuggling-weapons-directly-hezbollah-air/)[hamodia.com](/en/sources/222124),,,,[Israel: Iran is smuggling weapons to Hezbollah on commercial flights](http://www.jpost.com/Middle-East/Iran-News/Israel-Iran-is-smuggling-weapons-to-Hezbollah-on-commercial-flights-473344)[The Jerusalem Post (JPost.com)](/en/sources/277),,,,[Iran arms Hezbollah ahead of wider conflict with Israel](https://www.ynetnews.com/article/b1awrz2d6)[Ynetnews](/en/sources/249),,,,[Analysis: Risk assessment shows Israeli strike to thwart arms to Hezbollah worth it](http://www.jpost.com/Arab-Israeli-Conflict/Analysis-Iran-and-its-proxies-have-no-interest-in-opening-a-front-against-Israel-399462)[The Jerusalem Post (JPost.com)](/en/sources/277)[Reports: Arms seized in Kuwait linked to Iran and Hezbollah](http://www.haaretz.com/news/world/1.671375)[Haaretz](/en/sources/39),,,,[Israel: Iran smuggling dual-use items for Hezbollah weaponry via Beirut port](https://www.timesofisrael.com/israel-iran-smuggling-dual-use-items-for-hezbollah-weaponry-via-beirut-port/)[timesofisrael.com](/en/sources/198758),,,,[U.N. Chief Suspects Iran Violated Arms Embargo by Supplying Arms to Hezbollah](http://www.haaretz.com/middle-east-news/iran/1.763816)[Haaretz](/en/sources/39),,,,[Iran runs massive arms smuggling operation to foment West Bank unrest, report says](https://www.ynetnews.com/article/syyjrnfec)[Ynetnews](/en/sources/249),,,,[Morocco cuts Iran ties over alleged Hezbollah arms delivery to separatist group](https://www.timesofisrael.com/morocco-cuts-iran-ties-over-alleged-hezbollah-arms-delivery-to-separatist-group/)[timesofisrael.com](/en/sources/198758)[Israel's ambassador to U.N. says Iran arms Hezbollah through 'civilian channels'](https://www.ynetnews.com/articles/0,7340,L-5556202,00.html)[Ynetnews](/en/sources/249)[Ya'alon: Iran is currently seeking to smuggle advanced arms to Hezbollah](http://www.jpost.com/Arab-Israeli-Conflict/Yaalon-Iran-is-currently-seeking-to-smuggle-advanced-arms-to-Hezbollah-399261)[The Jerusalem Post (JPost.com)](/en/sources/277),,,,[Hezbollah leader calls on Lebanon to accept arms from Iran to confront Israel](https://www.timesofisrael.com/hezbollah-leader-calls-on-lebanon-to-accept-arms-from-iran-to-confront-israel/)[timesofisrael.com](/en/sources/198758)[SIGN OF AGGRESSION? Report: Iran increasing cash flow, arms to Taliban](http://www.foxnews.com/world/2015/06/12/iran-reportedly-stepping-up-shipments-arms-cash-to-taliban/)[Fox News](/en/sources/2556),,,,[From Houthis to Hezbollah, a look at the Iran-allied groups rallying to arms around Middle East](https://www.latimes.com/world-nation/story/2024-01-09/from-houthis-to-hezbollah-a-look-at-the-iran-allied-groups-rallying-to-arms-around-middle-east)[LA Times](/en/sources/125)[Iran admits arming Hezbollah](http://www.ynetnews.com/articles/0,7340,L-4622592,00.html)[Ynetnews](/en/sources/249)['Iran won't abandon Hezbollah'](http://www.ynetnews.com/articles/0,7340,L-4683876,00.html)[Ynetnews](/en/sources/249),,,,[Iran and Hezbollah](http://www.jpost.com/Opinion/Iran-and-Hezbollah-388267)[The Jerusalem Post (JPost.com)](/en/sources/277),,,,
